1.content: Fix RLS policies for database access
1.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Fixed 401 errors by implementing clean RLS policies for products and enhanced_product_variants tables. Public can view, authenticated users can manage.

2.content: Build professional ecom CRUD system for inventory management
2.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Built enterprise-grade inventory management system with: 1) 5-step product creation wizard with smart variant generation, 2) Professional editing interface with inline capabilities, 3) Advanced image upload and management system, 4) Modern data tables with filtering/search, 5) Bulk operations and CSV import/export, 6) Professional UI/UX that rivals Shopify/BigCommerce admin panels. Deployed with full functionality.

3.details: Update navigation tiles in admin-hub to point to correct Vercel app URLs instead of localhost

4.details: Edge functions fixes, CORS headers, app-specific fixes for order-management, user-profiles, wedding-portal, and ENV.md documentation
